snippet: The author of ‘Running With Scissors’ has a new memoir and a very old house.
abstract: Memoirist Augusten Burroughs loves his turn-of-the-18th century Southbury, Conn, farmhouse, where he, his husband and their three dogs roam freely among fully-stocked bookshelves and antique furnishings.
lead_paragraph: The author of ‘Running With Scissors’ has a new memoir and a very old house.

headline.print_headline: Making a Dash for the Country
headline.main: Augusten Burroughs Makes a Dash for the Country
